This World Mental Health Day, October 10th, @sephora will be donating 100% of @rarebeauty sales to the Rare Impact Fund for 24 hours!
I started The Rare Impact Fund as part of our commitment to providing mental health resources and support to young people around the world. Since 2020, the Rare Impact Fund has expanded globally and provided resources to 25 grantees.
Please join me on October 10th by shopping Rare Beauty at Sephora, online or in-store. Together, we can #MakeARarelmpact ü´∂üèª
